target.name: usage
target.description: Gives a message that helps using this file
target.echo:
--general-- usage : print this message properties : print ant properties
--dependencies-- dependencies-download : download the archives necessary to install staf dependencies-remove : remove the archives previously downloaded
--staf-- staf-install : install the staf staf-start : start staf without services staf-controler-start : start staf without services staf-remote-start : start staf with all the services staf-stop : stop staf staf-uninstall : uninstall staf-status : report if staf is installed and running staf-gui : start the STAX gui staf-jvmlogs : start the STAF jvm log viewer
--tests-- tests-configure : configure the functional tests tests-func-configure : configure the functional tests tests-stress-configure : configure the stress tests tests-run : run the functional tests tests-func-run : run the functional tests tests-stress-run : run the stress tests
